marno.protocol

Class MarnoProtocol

  • java.lang.Object
    • marno.protocol.MarnoProtocol

  • public class MarnoProtocol
extends java.lang.Object
    Common definitions for the socket-based Marno protocol.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String[] ERROR_MESSAGES
      Human-readable error messages for the clients.
      static int INVALID_SESSION
      Error code for an invalid session ID.
      static int INVALID_USERNAME
      Error code for an invalid username (either because it contains invalid characters or because it is already taken).
      static int PING_FREQUENCY
      The frequency at which the client should ping the server.
      static int TIMEOUT
      The limit of time to let pass before a client is disconnected from the server, or before the client decides the server is gone.
      static int USER_NOT_FOUND
      Error code for when a user was not found on the server.
